# NodeIdentification.PositionalIdentifier property

Provides positional identification of a node within and IDS via its hierarchy. Indices are 1-based to be user friendly. The hierarchy is separated by forward slash char.

```csharp
public string PositionalIdentifier { get; set; }
```
